Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, the case ID is the order_id. Each order_id represents a process instance.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The case ID is defined as the order_id, representing each process instance. Each order_id links to activities derived from the Orders table.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: From the Orders table, Order Created is identified as an activity occurring at the order_date. The resource for this activity is specified as the sales_person_id.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: From the Order Lines table, Items Picked is identified for each item, occurring at item_picking_date, with the resource as picker_id (Warehouse Staff). Multiple Items Picked events per order are possible, each including specific item details due to multiple items per order.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: From the Delivery table, Order Dispatched occurs at delivery_dispatch_date, with the resource as carrier_id (Carrier). Order Arrived is also derived from Delivery, at delivery_arrival_date, with the resource as carrier_id, allowing for multiple dispatch and arrival events per order.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: From the Invoice table, Invoice Issued happens at invoice_issue_date, with the resource as billing_person_id (Billing Clerk), and multiple invoices per order are possible. From the Payments table, Payment Received occurs at payment_date; the resource is unclear, as payment_method (e.g., Credit Card) isnt a human or entity, potentially inferring Billing Clerk, but not explicitly specified.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: For Payment Received, the resource is unclear as payment_method (e.g., Credit Card) isnt a human or entity; consider omitting or using a generic label. Payments are linked to invoices, which have billing_person_id, but payments might be customer-initiated, so leaving resource empty is safer.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Include additional attributes like customer_id, quantity, item_id, invoice_amount, and payment_method in the output as Other Attributes. Output will be formatted as a Markdown table with columns: Case ID, Activity Name, Timestamp, Resource/Actor, Other Attributes, sorted chronologically by timestamp.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Assume Order Created uses sales_person_id as resource; Items Picked has one event per item line with item_id and quantity as attributes. Order Dispatched and Order Arrived each have one event per delivery with delivery_id; Invoice Issued includes invoice_id and invoice_amount.
